cardTitle: What share of active sellers on the network are repeat sellers?
mainText: 8 of 10 of the active sellers in Septermber, have already completed an order in the previous 6 months, while 2 of the sellers are new
footnote: An active seller is classified as new in the month they place their first order starting April 2024. If the seller reappears in any subsequent month after April, they are then considered repeat.
